metadata.title: CVE-2014-9527 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: HSLFSlideShow in Apache POI before 3.11 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (infinite loop and deadlock) via a crafted PPT file.

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
